article: How can we stay healthy? One important rule is to exercise  _  . The Fang family try to exercise every day. Lee Fang  can not  exercise in the morning because he must be at his job at exactly seven o'clock. But he runs every evening. He would rather run than watch TV. He walks a lot,  _  . He walks to school every day, and after school he  _  basketball with his friends. Lee Fang goes to a yoag class  twice a week  . But it isn't  _  this way. Last year Mr. and Mrs. Fang used to  _  everywhere, even to the drugstore two blocks away. They thought they had to use the car all the time. They wouldn't walk. The Fangs all  feel  better now. And they believe you mustn't be lazy. You  needn't  exercise every day. But you should  _  to get in shape and stay in shape.
